text: It’s been a month now, I love it so far! It’s really tiny which is a big change compared to atomic/method.  People are super focused and skilled so i’m able to learn a lot from everyone which I love! How do you like Montreal so far? Let us know if you need anything, recommendations or whatever, we’ll be glad to help! Take care!

Cool, thank you! It's been a month for me here as well. It's been quite fun, Montréal is really strange for me, in an exciting way. We're in the process of making our flat work haha. What company did you go to in the end? I've always found small companies to be most fun :).
